original_title: Time period given to make amendments to A/L admission cards extended
original_body_lines: The window of time given to G.C.E. Advanced Level examination candidates to make revisions to their admission cards has been extended until December 22.

Commissioner General of Examinations, Amith Jayasundara noted that the applicants should recheck if all their details including the name, subjects, and medium of instruction are correctly mentioned in the admission card.
Accordingly, the time window given to make amendments to the admission cards, which was set to expire on Tuesday (Dec.19), has been extended until midnight on December 22.
The amendments can be made by visiting the Examination Department’s portal: https://onlineexams.gov.lk/onlineapps/
Mr. Jayasundara advised the students to keep a printed copy of the admission with them.
He said the A/L exam admissions have been issued to all the applicants.
